elements.name: question1
elements.html: Recall your experience constructing the 7 mini-tasks from 3 sample tasks from Step 7, using the decomposition system, and answer the following three questions.

elements.name: reflection_survey_1
elements.title: Describe a scenario when you used the program decomposition system to understand a sample project and find the corresponding code for a mini-task. In what ways did it help you find code that you were looking for? Describe a specific example.

elements.name: reflection_survey_2
elements.title: Describe a scenario where you've encountered a challenge or difficulty when completing the decomposition by sequence task. How did you overcome the challenge?

elements.name: reflection_survey_3
elements.title: Describe your strategy for finding code from the sample projects.

elements.name: reflection_survey_4
elements.title: After finding the code snippets for the 7 mini-tasks, how helpful were the 7 code snippets for you when using them to complete the integration task from Step 8?

elements.name: reflection_survey_5
elements.title: Do you think the integration task on Step 8 was made easier after using the system and the decomposition by sequence strategy, comparing to programming the project from scratch?

choices.text: Yes, the system and the strategy was helpful.
No, I think starting from scratch should be more or less the same.

pages.title: Reflection
pages.description: Reflect on your learning of Decomposition By Sequence.
